Room.Name: Llanandar Meadows Edge
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the edge of a grassy meadows surrounded by old oaks.
Room.LongDescription: A particularly large old oak stands here at the meadow's edge, slightly apart from the others. A ladder is set against its base, and high in the tree there is a ramshackle little wooden platform. It's hard to tell exactly what's up there, but something colorful flutters occasionally at the perimeter.
